titleStmt.title: Serious advice to delivered ones from sickness or any other dangers threatning death, how they ought to carry it that their mercyes may be continued, and other misery prevented, or, The healed ones prophulacticon or healthfull diet delivered in several sermons on John 5: 14 by James Allin.
titleStmt.author: Allen, James, 1632-1710.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
